resources.string: This IBAN has an unknown country code. Please make sure that the first two letters are right and try again.
This IBAN isn\'t the right length for this country. IBAN\'s in %1$s are %2$d characters long. Please check the IBAN and try again.
The entered IBAN was invalid. Most likely one of the numbers was wrong. Please check the IBAN and try again.
Please fill in both the name and IBAN fields.
The IBAN for %1$s has been copied to the clipboard.
